Name: Agriculture
Description: Skills focused on growing plants, particularly food.

Name: Food Processing
Description: Skills focused on processing food into various products.

Name: Engineering
Description: The General Group of skills related to the various kinds of Engineering.

Name: Metallurgy
Description: Skills related to smelting, refining, and alloying Metals.

Name: Animal Husbandry
Description: Skills related to Animals, raising, and breeding them.

Name: Metalworking
Description: Skills related to working and shaping metals.

Name: Seafairing
Description: Skills related to the sea and living on or near the sea.

Name: Woodworking
Description: Skills related to working with wood.

Name: Chemistry
Description: Skills related to Chemistry and working with Chemicals.
